unit_learning_outcomes.description: Refine methods of observation and assessment of children's learning and development to inform curriculum decisions and documentation.
Apply an in-depth understanding of research and theory relating to the effective learning and teaching of infants and toddlers.
Communicate understandings of curriculum decisions to a broad audience using a range of communication strategies including documentation, oral presentation and web-based technologies.
Understand the processes of documenting pedagogically in ways that enhance the visibility of infants as thinkers, theorisers and agents of their own and others learning.
Implement the requirements of the relevant statutory processes in relation to early childhood curriculum.

enrolment_rules.description: EDST3020 or ECHP325 or ECHP3250 or ECHP327 or ECHP3270

assessments.description: Report on pedagogies appropriate to working with children birth to two years.  Apply  understandings of these pedagogies in analysis of video clips â€“ infants and toddlers play, learning and development 2000words
Provide evidence of teaching decisions and cycle of reflective teaching through an oral presentation and written submission 2000 words
This is a hurdle and implementation of at risk procedure will take place of a second attempt

data.subject_search_title: EDST4050 - Practice of Teaching: Making Learning Visible with Infants and Toddlers
data.description: This unit incorporates theoretical and practical aspects of teaching and includes a compulsory professional experience field component working with children birth the three years. The unit builds on previous professional experience units particularly in the areas of curriculum decision-making, refinement of teaching strategies and documentation of children's learning. This unit draws on contemporary research and theory relating to infant/toddler pedagogies that promote young children's learning and development. A focus of this unit is on making the learning of infants and toddlers visible and building student's confidence to communicate their teaching decisions to a wide audience including other educators, families and the broader community.
data.search_title: EDST4050 - Practice of Teaching: Making Learning Visible with Infants and Toddlers
